TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Koyo, title = Koyo, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koyo} }

S.FORM: Koyo Itiniay i Ruisui Cen no Hualien ko Koyo a niyaro', 424 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 976 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 29 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 283 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 71 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 693 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis20 , 1 , Truku3 , Tayal3 , Bunun1 , roma1 .
